mapper.select: SELECT mno, id, mail, jdate, tcnt, rcnt, NVL(sumpoint, 0) spoint FROM member m, ( SELECT count(t.mno) tcnt, m.mno no1 FROM transaction t, member m WHERE m.mno = t.mno(+) GROUP BY m.mno ), ( SELECT count(r.rno) rcnt, m.mno no2 FROM review r, transaction t, member m WHERE r.tno(+) = t.tno AND m.mno = t.mno(+) GROUP BY m.mno ), ( SELECT mb.mno no3, m1.sumpoint sumpoint FROM ( SELECT m.mno, p.sumpoint, p.pno FROM point p, member m WHERE m.mno = p.mno(+) AND p.pno IN (SELECT max(pno) mpno FROM point GROUP BY mno) ) m1, member mb WHERE m1.mno(+) = mb.mno ) WHERE no1 = m.mno AND no2 = m.mno AND no3 = m.mno AND isshow = 'cst' ORDER BY m.mno ASC
SELECT tno, ino, gname, price, quantity FROM goods, transaction WHERE mno = #{mno} ORDER BY tno DESC
SELECT substr(mon, 4, 2) label FROM ( SELECT ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, LEVEL - 6) mon FROM DUAL CONNECT BY rownum < 7 )

SELECT q.qno, q.title, q.body, q.mno, q.qdate, a.qno ano, a.body abody, a.mno mngno, a.qdate adate, m.id, mng.id mid FROM qna q, qna a, member m, member mng WHERE q.qno = a.upqno(+) AND q.title is not null AND q.mno = m.mno AND a.mno = mng.mno(+)
